20110124230849.000|20110124230851.000|TR0|elsewhere. Though loosely aligned, many of 
20110124230851.000|20110124230853.000|TR0|them follow Chechen rebel leader Doku 
20110124230853.000|20110124230856.000|TR0|Umarov.  Linked to a suicide bombing in

20110124230858.000|20110124230901.000|TR0|dozens, he's on the State Department's

20110124230923.000|20110124230925.000|TR0|the Black Widows.       KUCHINS:  
20110124230925.000|20110124230928.000|TR0|Typically the bomber is a woman.  One of

20110124230933.000|20110124230935.000|TR0|her and trained to do this job

20110124230938.000|20110124230940.000|TR0|whether that's the case here at Domodedovo 
20110124230940.000|20110124230943.000|TR0|Airport, but that is sort of the pattern.

20110124231111.000|20110124231114.000|TR0|
20110124231114.000|20110124231116.000|TR0|TODD:  That's right, another reason for 
20110124231116.000|20110124231119.000|TR0|Americans to care about this.  Russia is a 
20110124231119.000|20110124231121.000|TR0|big oil and gas producer for Europe.  But 
20110124231121.000|20110124231124.000|TR0|of course all oil prices around the world 
20110124231124.000|20110124231126.000|TR0|are kind of interconnected.  If Russia 
20110124231126.000|20110124231129.000|TR0|goes through with another insurgency or it 
20110124231129.000|20110124231131.000|TR0|implodes somewhere in the North Caucasus 
20110124231131.000|20110124231134.000|TR0|region, the price of oil for all of us 
20110124231134.000|20110124231136.000|TR0|could be affected.
20110124231136.000|20110124231138.000|TR0|
20110124231138.000|20110124231141.000|TR0|BLITZER:  So there's a lot at stake right 
20110124231141.000|20110124231143.000|TR0|now what's happening in Russia.  Thanks, 
20110124231143.000|20110124231146.000|TR0|Brian.  Thanks very much.
20110124231146.000|20110124231148.000|TR0|

20110124232231.000|20110124232234.000|TR0|Tucson shooting massacre was in federal 
20110124232234.000|20110124232236.000|TR0|court this afternoon, pleading not guilty 
20110124232236.000|20110124232238.000|TR0|to the rampage that left six people dead 
20110124232238.000|20110124232241.000|TR0|and a U.S. congresswoman gravely wounded.
20110124232241.000|20110124232243.000|TR0|
20110124232243.000|20110124232246.000|TR0|CNN's Ted Rowlands was in the courtroom; 
20110124232246.000|20110124232248.000|TR0|he's joining us now live.
20110124232248.000|20110124232251.000|TR0|
20110124232251.000|20110124232253.000|TR0|Tell us what happened, Ted.
20110124232253.000|20110124232256.000|TR0|
20110124232256.000|20110124232258.000|TR0|TED ROWLANDS, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  Well, 
20110124232258.000|20110124232301.000|TR0|Wolf, Jared Lee Loughner came in with a 
20110124232301.000|20110124232303.000|TR0|version of that familiar smirk that was on 
20110124232303.000|20110124232306.000|TR0|his face in that police-released photo.  
20110124232306.000|20110124232308.000|TR0|He had that smile when he entered the 
20110124232308.000|20110124232310.000|TR0|courtroom.
20110124232310.000|20110124232313.000|TR0|
20110124232313.000|20110124232315.000|TR0|Then he sat down and settled in.  For most 
20110124232315.000|20110124232318.000|TR0|of the proceedings, he stared straight 
20110124232318.000|20110124232320.000|TR0|ahead as he did the first time he was in 
20110124232320.000|20110124232323.000|TR0|court.  But a couple times he did smile at 
20110124232323.000|20110124232325.000|TR0|something that happened.  At one point he 
20110124232325.000|20110124232328.000|TR0|looked up into the gallery.  The courtroom 
20110124232328.000|20110124232330.000|TR0|he was in had a second floor sort of 
20110124232330.000|20110124232333.000|TR0|balcony.  He looked up.  And it looked to 
20110124232333.000|20110124232335.000|TR0|me as though he actually chuckled, but he 
20110124232335.000|20110124232338.000|TR0|definitely smiled when he looked up and 
20110124232338.000|20110124232340.000|TR0|saw that so many people were looking down 
20110124232340.000|20110124232342.000|TR0|at him.
20110124232342.000|20110124232345.000|TR0|
20110124232345.000|20110124232347.000|TR0|It was a very quick hearing.  He basically 
20110124232347.000|20110124232350.000|TR0|entered not guilty pleas to three counts.  
20110124232350.000|20110124232352.000|TR0|The judge entered the pleas on his behalf. 
20110124232352.000|20110124232355.000|TR0| So he didn't have to speak.  But he has 
20110124232355.000|20110124232357.000|TR0|pled officially not guilty to three counts 
20110124232357.000|20110124232400.000|TR0|of attempted murder.  Those two murder 
20110124232400.000|20110124232402.000|TR0|counts have not come through yet.  In 
20110124232402.000|20110124232405.000|TR0|terms of the grand jury indictment, the 
20110124232405.000|20110124232407.000|TR0|prosecutor told the judge that they do

20110124232419.000|20110124232422.000|TR0|escort.  From here on out, it looks like

20110124232424.000|20110124232427.000|TR0|Tucson.  The federal government asked the

20110124233353.000|20110124233356.000|TR0|the government's grown too fat, out of 
20110124233356.000|20110124233358.000|TR0|control. And we need to do the budget
